casebody.data:
Michael Teitle et al v. Granite Mutual Insurance Company. (73 A2d 300)

February Term, 1950

Present: Sherburne, C. J., Jeffords, Cleary, Adams and Blackmer, JJ. Opinion filed May 2, 1950. *237Witters & Longmoore and Clarence V. Akley for the plaintiffs. H. William Scott, Arthur L. Graves, and Frederick G. Mehlman for the defendant. Jeffords, J.

The issues in this cause are identical with those in Teitle v. The London and Lancashire Insurance Co., ante page 228, 73 A2d 300. For the reasons given in that opinion the same entry must be made.

Judgment affirmed.
